alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 1:26PM EST until December 03 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM EST THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow, gusty winds, blowing snow, and rapidly falling temperatures expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with lower amounts of a coating to 3 inches at lower elevations and locations farther inland from Lake Superior. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph creating blowing snow. Temperatures rapidly falling below freezing while snow is falling could lead to flash freeze conditions. * WHERE...Portions of central Upper and western Upper Michigan. * WHEN...From 9 PM EST this evening to 11 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
